section.name: Downloads
section.p: JMS CTS releases are available in both install and source archives from the SourceForge download page.
For convenience, they are provided in zip and tar/gzip formats.

subsection.name: Install archives
subsection.p:
The following install archives are available for download:
jmscts-@RELEASE-VERSION@.zip
jmscts-@RELEASE-VERSION@.tar.gz

These include:
The JMS CTS
3rd party JARS required by the JMS CTS
The complete set of documentation
Scripts to run the JMS CTS on Windows and UNIX
Sample configuration

subsection.name: Source archives
subsection.p:
The following source archives are available for download:
jmscts-@RELEASE-VERSION@-src.zip
jmscts-@RELEASE-VERSION@-src.tar.gz

The source distributions are a clean CVS checkout of the JMS CTS sources at the time the version was released.
These can be used to build an install archive of JMS CTS.
